Server Status

/server_status get

get

Get the server status

get /server_status

Get the server status

  • Response

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "status": 200
}

Locales

/locales get

get

Get all available languages

get /locales

Get all available languages

    Challenges

    /challenges get post

    get

    Get all open challenges and their opponents

    post

    Create a new challenge

    get /challenges

    Get all open challenges and their opponents

      post /challenges

      Create a new challenge

        /challenges/{challengeId} get

        get

        get /challenges/{challengeId}

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • challengeId: required(string)

        /challenges/{challengeId}/accept post

        post

        Accept a challenge from your opponent

        post /challenges/{challengeId}/accept

        Accept a challenge from your opponent

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • challengeId: required(string)

        /challenges/{challengeId}/submit/{questionId} post

        post

        Submit an answer to a question

        post /challenges/{challengeId}/submit/{questionId}

        Submit an answer to a question

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • challengeId: required(string)
        • questionId: required(string)

        /challenges/{challengeId}/result get

        get

        Get the result of a finished challenge

        get /challenges/{challengeId}/result

        Get the result of a finished challenge

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • challengeId: required(string)

        Users

        /users/{userId} get post

        get

        Get the user information

        post

        Update a user

        get /users/{userId}

        Get the user information

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • userId: required(string)

        post /users/{userId}

        Update a user

        • Request

        URI Parameters

        • userId: required(string)

        /users/login post

        post

        Login a user

        post /users/login

        Login a user

        • Response

        HTTP status code 200

        Body

        Media type: application/json

        Type: any

        Example:

        {
  "status": true,
  "user": {},
  "rank":23
}

        HTTP status code 400

        Body

        Media type: application/json

        Type: any

        Example:

        {
  "status": false,
  "user": null
}

        /users/leaderboard get

        get

        Get the leaderboard

        get /users/leaderboard

        Get the leaderboard

        • Request
        • Response

        Query Parameters

        • offset: (number)

          The offset for the leaderboard

          Example:

          10
        • row_count: (number)

          How many entries are returned

          Example:

          10

        HTTP status code 200

        Body

        Media type: application/json

        Type: any

        Example:

        {
  "status": true
}

        HTTP status code 400

        Body

        Media type: application/json

        Type: any

        Example:

        {
  "status": false
}
